data.title: Amsterdam → Sargans by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Amsterdam to Sargans in 10h 24m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Amsterdam to Sargans today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Amsterdam to Sargans by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 13 hours 47 minutes to travel from Amsterdam to Sargans by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 10 hours 24 minutes though. You'll usually find 21 trains per day running along the 421 miles (677 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 2 changes during the journey to Sargans, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. You'll be travelling with TGV, Thalys or ICE on your way to Sargans, as these are the main rail operators on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Amsterdam to Sargans.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Sargans by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
